segments.text: I like watching comedies , like ' Boat ' . Do you like watching comedies too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really , I like watching horror movies , like ' The Unborn . '
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You like horror movies ? I don't like them because they're too scary ! I like comedies because I love to laugh .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like horror movies because I like to be scared .
segments.speaker: S2
